Author: phenylammonium
Text: It's shameful, but I do this too. I'll suffer through chest pain and shakiness and lightheadedness after purging because I'm tOo FaT tO dIe oF An Ed. The thing is, your ED lies to you. It wants you to be as sick as possible and it wants to kill you. You deserve help and medical care, no matter what your weight.

Author: hotforkingmess
Text: I’ve been in bed with the flu since Wednesday, desperately need a steroid shot to get my voice back for an upcoming audition and I’m putting it off as long as possible for this exact reason.  You’re not alone.
